Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: Etherbonded/broken
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn has produced constantly, leaving them numb or happily broken.

li.label: Etherbroken
li.description: Constant production has caused [PAWN_nameDef] to become numb and submit to their fate.

li.label: Etherbonded
li.description: Constant production has caused [PAWN_nameDef] to accept change, and for some reason will now enjoy producing.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: Sapience limited
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn has had their sapience limited to a certain level.

li.label: Lizardbrain
li.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to feral levels.

li.label: Chookbrain
li.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to mostly feral levels.

li.label: Cowbrain
li.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to almost feral levels.

li.label: Dogbrain
li.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to conflicted levels.

li.label: Monkeybrain
li.description: The sapience of this pawn has been capped to mostly sapient levels.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: modified production
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn has taken mutagen-infused medication that modified their mutation's biological outputs.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: animal affinity
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn has a greater apriciation for animals.

li.label: animal affinity
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s new form has given [PAWN_objective] a greater apriciation for what [PAWN_pronoun] now sees as [PAWN_possessive] fellow animals. It doesn't hurt that [PAWN_pronoun] now speaks their (body) language, either.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: plant affinity
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn cares deeply for plants.

li.label: plant affinity
li.description: Because [PAWN_nameDef]'s new form has brought [PAWN_objective] closer to nature (too close some might say), [PAWN_pronoun] now better understands how plants fit into the circle of life and is much more careful when tending them.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: paragon
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: This pawn adapts quickly to new mutations, and can sometimes get better, more powerful mutations than normal morphs.

li.label: paragon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] adapts quickly to new mutations, and can sometimes get better, more powerful mutations than normal morphs.
li.messageText: Some of [PAWN_nameDef]'s mutations seem to be adapting faster and becoming more powerful.

Pawnmorph.AspectDef.label: afflicted
Pawnmorph.AspectDef.description: this pawn not only never adapts to new mutations, their mutations sometimes degrade into worse versions.

li.label: afflicted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] not only never adapts to new mutations, their mutations sometimes degrade into worse versions.
li.messageText: Some of [PAWN_nameDef]'s mutations seem to be degrading into worse forms.
